page.title: 13ECOLOGY
page.content: On Thursday,June 13th,a teacher and eight pupils set out from the school to do an informal survey of the area surrounding the school.They were to look especially at:_{1.}Growth in the Hedgerows{2.}Transport{3.}Buildings{ {4.}Land usage.In June the hedgerows are full of growth;and the group identified Quercas Rubra,Oak,Chestnut ,Holly,Ash and Sycamore trees.Also different types of Moss & Fungi;Dock ,Ivy,Bluebell,Wild Garlic,Buttercup ,Dandelion,Red Clover,Fox Glove, Common Ragwort,lobelia,Red Campion. The group also noted surprisingly few Wild Birds:Robins,Crows,Magpies and Sparrows being plentiful.{ }
